name: discoverer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who discovers something: discoverer of They were the discoverers of the structure of DNA. This scientific law is named after its original discoverer. See
discover
More examplesFewer examplesThe chemical won its discoverer a Nobel Prize. Inventors and discoverers sometimes fail to see the possibilities in their own findings.The drug's discoverer has been given permission to treat 30 terminally ill patients.
